headlines.headline: Africa Eye: Di tree wey dem dey smuggle pass

media.caption: Africa Eye: Crime wey dem dey commit against di West African Rosewood

synopses.long:
BBC African Eye find out say The Gambia dey export pass 300,000 tonnes of rosewood give China since 2017.
But di wahala be say dem don finish dia own suply of rosewood tay-tay. 
Investigate enta di mata show sy dem dey cari di rosewood wey dem dey sell from Senegal even though di plant dey protected.
Umaru Fofana go Southern Senegal near di Gambian border to check wetin dey happun.
synopses.short: Africa Eye: Crime wey dem dey commit against di West African Rosewood

media.title: Africa Eye: Di tree wey dey blead

items.summary: Di rosewood don enta China plenti fro di Gambia even though dem no dey produce am again, so how di kontri dey get am?

headlines.headline: Wrong nutrition belief wey pipo get about pregnant women

media.caption: International women day: common nutrition myths about women wey get belle.

synopses.long:
Collins Akanno, wey be clinical nutritionist with diet 234 don give more informate on top di common nutrition belief wey some pipo get concerning women wey dey pregnant as di world dey mark international women's day today, 

Oga Akanno tell BBC Pidgin say na lie for dat myths wey say if women wey get belle chop food wey dey draw (okra and snail) e go make di pikin dey dull. Instead e say did food dey good for dia body.

Di clinical nutritionist also list some oda belief wey get to do with taking of traditional concoction to make di pikin for belle small. E say dis kain behaviour no good as e fit affect di baby later in di future.
synopses.medium: Plenti-plenti false belief about nutrition in pregnancy don make some women dey confused.
synopses.short: International women day: common nutrition myths about women wey get belle.

media.title: Wrong nutrition belief wey pipo get about pregnant women

items.summary: Plenti-plenti false belief about nutrition in pregnancy don make some women dey confused.

headlines.headline: â€˜I just look myself as di first among equalsâ€™

media.caption: Zainab Bulkachuwa, Nigeria first female president of di courts of appeal don retire

synopses.long:
Afta 45 years for judiciary and five years as di president of di courts of appeal, Justice Zainab Bulkachuwa don retire.
 
Zainab Bulkachuwa na di first Nigerian woman to become di president of di courts of appeal of di kontri.

She tok to BBC for dis exclusive interview about di challenges she take eye see for di work and her determination as a woman to serve and bring ogbonge reform to do judiciary.

She also tok about her journey and why she excuse herself from di presidential election tribunal mata afta PDP and dia candidate Atiku Abubakar express concern say her husband belong to APC.
synopses.medium: Zainab Bulkachuwa na di first Nigerian woman to become di president of di courts of appeal of di kontri.
synopses.short: Zainab Bulkachuwa, Nigeria first female president of di courts of appeal don retire

media.title: â€˜I just look myself as di first among equalsâ€™

items.summary: Zainab Bulkachuwa na di first Nigerian woman to become di president of di courts of appeal of di kontri.

headlines.headline: Problem ladies get with Lagos night life

indexImage.altText: Problem ladies get with Lagos night life

media.caption: Turn up: Di problem ladies get with Lagos night life

synopses.long:
lagos na busy city, na home to many of Nigeria biggest businesses, but e dey also know for im night life.

Ulo Jessica Oputa na Nightclub promoter wey say she dey face discrimination becos she be woman and abuse on daily basis. 

Ulo tell BBC Minute about wetin e dey like to be woman wey dey work for club industry.
synopses.medium: Dis na di tori of Ulo Jessica Oputa wey dey work as club promoter and wetin she dey face.

headlines.headline: See di artist wey dey turn car parts to furniture

media.caption: Artist wey dey turn car parts to furniture

synopses.long:
Diseye Tantua na Nigerian-Ghana artist wey dey create furniture as im dey use car parts from di 90's.

For 2016, Tantua make table from im papa old motor. Di response to im creation bin dey positive, so im begin to market di tins wey im dey make.
synopses.medium: Diseye Tantua na Nigerian-Ghana artist wey dey change di furniture industry for Nigeria.
synopses.short: Artist wey dey turn car parts to furniture

media.title: See di artist wey dey turn car parts to furniture

items.summary: Diseye Tantua na Nigerian-Ghana artist wey dey change di furniture industry for Nigeria.

headlines.headline: If lawmakers wan shutdown, dem suppose shutdown di whole kontri too - Nigerians

media.caption: Coronavirus: If lawmakers wan shutdown, dem supposed shutdown di whole kontri too

synopses.long:
As Coronavirus gbege don tanda for Nigeria, di kontri lawmakers dey touchlight motion wey want make dem shutdown di Assembly for two weeks sake of di deadly disease.

Na Senator Uyime raise di motion on Tuesday say make di lawmakers use di two weeks put evritin in place to protect dem and dia workers from COVID-19.

Di house release tweet day dem go touchlight di mata on Wednesday before dem go decide weda or not to go for break.

Di tori come make Nigerians begin dey para say di break no make sense unto say health workers dey do dia work to fight di virus.

Dis video dey show di views of some Nigerians for south west state of Lagos.
synopses.medium: Nigeria National Assembly dey touch light motion wey say make dem go on two weeks break sake of Coronavirus and dis na wetin Nigerians tink.
synopses.short: Coronavirus: If lawmakers wan shutdown, dem supposed shutdown di whole kontri too

media.title: If lawmakers wan shutdown, dem supposed shutdown di whole kontri too - Nigerians

items.summary: Nigeria National Assembly dey touch light motion wey say make dem go on two weeks break sake of Coronavirus and dis na wetin Nigerians tink.

headlines.headline: 'Bullet wey dem shoot me pass one leg enta di oda'

media.caption: Tarkwa Bay: 'Bullet wey dem shoot me pass one leg enta di oda'

synopses.long:
On January 21, 2020, security operatives pursue and demolish di house of residents of Tarkwa Bay, wey be waterfront community near di Lagos harbour.

Tori be say thousands of pipo na im di gbege affect.

One of di victims na Jite Adjoboefe. E claim say di Navy pipo shoot and abandon am during di eviction. 

Tarkwa Bay na small island for Lagos state south west Nigeria. Over 4000 pipo from Nigeria and oda kontris bin dey live dia and di area na recreation place for beach joli.
synopses.short: Tarkwa Bay: 'Bullet wey dem shoot me pass one leg enta di oda'

media.title: 'Bullet wey dem shoot me pass one leg enta di oda'

items.summary: On January 21, 2020, security operatives pursue and demolish di house of residents of Tarkwa Bay, wey be waterfront community near di Lagos harbour for South West Nigeria.

metadata.summary: We dey give una latest tori on top politics, environment, business, sports, entertainment, health, fashion and all di oda things wey dey happen for West and Central Africa come add di rest of di world join. For better informate plus explanation of all di ogbonge tori wey pipo never hear about for inside West and Central Africa, BBC Pidgin dey serve am with video, audio, maps and oda graphics join.
